diseases.name: Bronchitis
diseases.symptoms: cough with mucus, chest discomfort, fatigue
diseases.recommendation: Rest, stay hydrated, and use bronchodilators or antibiotics if bacterial.

diseases.name: Peptic Ulcer
diseases.recommendation: Use antacids, avoid NSAIDs, and treat H. pylori if present.

diseases.name: Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)
diseases.symptoms: burning sensation during urination, frequent urge to urinate
diseases.recommendation: Use prescribed antibiotics and drink plenty of fluids.

diseases.name: Hepatitis B
diseases.recommendation: Antiviral medication if chronic, avoid alcohol, and monitor liver function.

diseases.name: Measles
diseases.recommendation: Supportive care, isolate patient, and ensure vaccination.

diseases.name: Chickenpox
diseases.recommendation: Rest, avoid scratching, and use antivirals if severe.

diseases.name: Meningitis
diseases.recommendation: Hospitalization and treatment with antibiotics or antivirals.

diseases.name: Tonsillitis
diseases.symptoms: sore throat, swollen tonsils, difficulty swallowing
diseases.recommendation: Use antibiotics if bacterial and manage pain with supportive care.

diseases.name: Scabies
diseases.symptoms: intense itching, skin rash with burrows
diseases.recommendation: Apply prescribed scabicide cream and wash clothing in hot water.

diseases.name: Ringworm
diseases.symptoms: itchy, circular red rash on skin
diseases.recommendation: Use antifungal creams or oral medication.

diseases.name: Conjunctivitis (Pink Eye)
diseases.recommendation: Maintain hygiene, use antibiotic drops if bacterial, and avoid touching eyes.

diseases.name: Otitis Media
diseases.recommendation: Use pain relievers, antibiotics if bacterial, and monitor for complications.

diseases.name: Gastroenteritis
diseases.recommendation: Rehydrate, rest, and use antibiotics only if bacterial.

diseases.name: Rheumatic Fever
diseases.symptoms: fever, joint pain, rash, heart inflammation
diseases.recommendation: Use antibiotics and anti-inflammatory drugs, monitor heart health.

diseases.name: Migraine
diseases.symptoms: throbbing headache, nausea, sensitivity to light
diseases.recommendation: Avoid triggers, use prescribed pain relievers or preventive medications.

diseases.name: Epilepsy
diseases.recommendation: Use antiepileptic drugs, avoid seizure triggers, and regular follow-up.

diseases.name: Depression
diseases.symptoms: persistent sadness, fatigue, loss of interest
diseases.recommendation: Therapy, antidepressant medication, support groups.

diseases.name: Anxiety Disorder
diseases.recommendation: Cognitive-behavioral therapy, relaxation techniques, medication if needed.

diseases.name: Anemia
diseases.recommendation: Iron supplements, dietary changes, treat underlying causes.

diseases.name: Goiter
diseases.recommendation: Iodine supplementation, thyroid hormone therapy, surgery if large.

diseases.name: Hypertension
diseases.recommendation: Reduce salt intake, exercise daily, and take antihypertensive medication as prescribed.

diseases.name: Diabetes Mellitus
diseases.symptoms: frequent urination, increased thirst, unexplained weight loss
diseases.recommendation: Maintain a balanced diet, exercise regularly, monitor blood sugar, and take insulin or oral medications.

diseases.name: Asthma
diseases.symptoms: shortness of breath, wheezing, chest tightness
diseases.recommendation: Avoid triggers, use inhalers as prescribed, and monitor symptoms.

diseases.name: Malaria
diseases.recommendation: Take antimalarial medications and use mosquito nets.

diseases.name: Pneumonia
diseases.recommendation: Use antibiotics as prescribed, rest, and stay hydrated.

diseases.name: Tuberculosis
diseases.symptoms: persistent cough, weight loss, night sweats, fever
diseases.recommendation: Take a full course of anti-TB drugs as prescribed.

diseases.name: HIV/AIDS
diseases.recommendation: Start and adhere to antiretroviral therapy (ART).

diseases.name: COVID-19
diseases.symptoms: fever, cough, loss of taste or smell, fatigue
diseases.recommendation: Isolate, take supportive care, and follow medical advice.

diseases.name: Dysentery
diseases.recommendation: Maintain hygiene, drink clean water, and use antibiotics if bacterial.

diseases.name: Typhoid Fever
diseases.symptoms: high fever, weakness, stomach pain, constipation or diarrhea
diseases.recommendation: Use antibiotics as prescribed, rest, and hydrate.

diseases.name: Peptic Ulcer Disease
diseases.recommendation: Avoid NSAIDs, eat smaller meals, and take acid-reducing medication.

diseases.name: Pelvic Inflammatory Disease
diseases.symptoms: lower abdominal pain, fever, abnormal discharge
diseases.recommendation: Complete full antibiotic course.
